definition: to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
to plan/to seek/scheme
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit

sentences.english: The goal of a well-run company may be to make profits for its shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 一家善于经营的企业，其目的在于为其股东谋利益。

sentences.english: "Seek profit for cultivators, bring health to life" is our mission.
sentences.chinese: 为耕者谋利，让食者健康。

sentences.english: Don't take the resources of the company to own interests.
sentences.chinese: 不要拿着公司的资源给自己谋利益。

sentences.english: Most importantly, they are now in the interests of the people for his country.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是，他们现在都是在为本国人民谋利益的。

sentences.english: The highest aim of life is to seek gain for the people.
sentences.chinese: 人生的最高理想是为人民谋利益。

sentences.english: A scientist should benefit all mankinds.
sentences.chinese: 科学家要为全人类谋利益。

sentences.english: use people's money to serve people's needs
sentences.chinese: 用人民的钱为人民谋利益。

sentences.english: It is a policy to gain profit.
She has devoted all her life time to benefiting the poor.
sentences.chinese: 她毕生的精力都奉献给了为穷人谋利益。

sentences.english: All policy-making should be based on and proceeds from the practice of working for the benefit of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 为人民群众谋利益，是一切决策的出发点和落脚点。

sentences.english: Such laudable and honorable strivings are the only real ways to make profit honestly.
sentences.chinese: 这种正当和值得赞赏的努力就是诚实谋利的正确途径。

definition: to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/exploitation
to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/see also 謀取|谋取[mou2 qu3]
to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)
to seek/to strive for/to obtain/see also 牟取[mou2 qu3]
to accumulate wealth/to rake in money
to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense/venal and selfish behavior
personal gain/(one's own) selfish interest
to gain from corrupt dealing/to engage in graft/to feather one's nest
to stuff one's pockets/to take bribes
lawless/illegal/unlawful
official authority used for private interests (idiom); to attain private ends by abusing public position
blinded by greed (idiom)
to profiteer/profiteering
to bribe/to give bribes
to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
to receive/to accept
